name: Virtual Educa World Congress and Expo
content: The World Congress and Expo integrates: • XXII Virtual Educa International Symposium • XI Multilateral Forum ‘Planet 2030’ • X Exhibition ‘Models and technologies 4.0’ URLs: Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/565979-2?pid=4868 Twitter: https://go.evvnt.com/565979-3?pid=4868 Sponsor: https://go.evvnt.com/565979-4?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 am to 6:00 pm Venue Details: Lisbon Congress Centre, 1 Praca das Industrias, Lisboa, 1300-307, Portugal
